A C E M R S U 
All Classes All Packages

A

app - package app
Provides classes for the JRabbit Chat application.

C

Chat - Class in app
Application to call the message service.
Chat(String, String, String) - Constructor for class app.Chat
Initializes the message service.
close() - Method in class services.MessageService
Closes the connection to the RabbitMQ server and the channels to send and receive messages.
connection - Variable in class services.MessageService
The connection to the RabbitMQ server.

E

exchange - Variable in class services.MessageService
The room to send and receive messages.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class app.Chat
Main method.
maxretries - Static variable in class app.Chat
The maximum number of retries.
maxretries - Static variable in class app.Utils
Maximum number of retries on console read
MessageService - Class in services
Class to send and receive messages using RabbitMQ.
MessageService(String, String, String) - Constructor for class services.MessageService
Initializes the connection to the RabbitMQ server and the channels to send and receive messages.

R

readInt(String) - Static method in class app.Utils
Read an integer from the console
readStr(String) - Static method in class app.Utils
Read a string from the console
receiveChannel - Variable in class services.MessageService
The channel to receive messages.
receiveMessage() - Method in class services.MessageService
Receives a message from the exchange.
run() - Method in class app.Chat
Runs the application.

S

sendChannel - Variable in class services.MessageService
The channel to send messages.
senderId - Variable in class services.MessageService
The id of the sender.
sendMessage(String) - Method in class services.MessageService
Sends a message to the exchange.
service - Variable in class app.Chat
The message service.
services - package services
Provides classes for services related to the JRabbit Chat application.

U

username - Variable in class services.MessageService
The users name.
Utils - Class in app
Utils for the Chat application
Utils() - Constructor for class app.Utils
Prevent instantiation of this class
